narrative.title: Deutsches Afrikakorps - 1941Q1
narrative.situation: German Panzer Corps deployed in North Africa during 1941Q1.
narrative.objectives: Mobile armored warfare in desert terrain. Initial German intervention in North Africa to support Italian forces.
narrative.axis_objective: Maintain defensive positions and inflict maximum casualties on Allied forces.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and secure strategic objectives while minimizing casualties.

supply.notes: Supply critical due to Mediterranean convoy losses. Water especially critical in desert operations.

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

supply_states.notes: Supply critical due to Mediterranean convoy losses. Water especially critical in desert operations.
